name: Monster Clean Out
description:
Self Imposed October Halloween Jam

There's a lot of strange noises coming from the mansion at the end of the block.

The Neighborhood Association has had it out for you for a while:
"Go take care of whatever the issue is, or you're off the board."

Fine.  I'm sure you can handle whatever it is.

Notes:

My first Godot Engine game.

Thank you to Eli Cuaycong for his tutorials.

Thank you to umbromaniii for his sample pack that I used to make the music and sfx.

Game will probably stutter in most browsers.  If it's a problem, try the downloadable version.  It may still be a problem after that, but hopefully less so.

Mac and Linux downloads are untested.  Just Godot's export defaults.

Sometimes monsters glitch out and fly through walls.  Going a different direction, or reloading the game should avoid it.

I know the game stutters when the axe hits... anything.  Sorry.
